```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(survey)
library(RSQLite)
data = load("./Data/NSDUH_final.RData")
```

##Making survey design object
```{r}
survey_design = 
  svydesign(id = ~NSDUH_final$verep, strata = ~NSDUH_final$vestr,
            weights = ~NSDUH_final$ANALWT_C, nest = T, data = NSDUH_final)
```

#Estimating Means

```{r}
svymean(~NSDUH_final$AGE2, design = subset(survey_design, NSDUH_final$AGE2 >= 7))
```
